sequence:
Red Spider Lily's Love

<size=45>Chapter 3 - Love Rivals and... Exceptions?</size>

scripts.say: Ahh, how wonderful, I get to spend my day off shopping with you, Commander... *Giggle*~
Akagi was cheerfully swinging around her shopping bag as she walked alongside me.
Are you tired, Commander...? Please, you're only human, you needn't pretend to be stronger than you are... I will carry your bags for you~
After saying that, Akagi took the shopping bags out of my hands. Actually, since she brought it up...

options.content: (... I might be a bit tired, mentally speaking.)

scripts.say: *Giggle*... You filthy little insect, are you trying to steal the Commander from Akagi!? That will be the last mistake you ever— Commander? Why are you stopping Akagi?

You just stared at that girl, didn't you? Why won't you stare at Akagi? Akagi thought we were supposed to be shopping together? Are you saying that girl has seduced you? Akagi will have to dispose of her later...
Taih— That wench is right behind us! One day Akagi will end her, Akagi swears it...!
Ah, it was nothing, Commander! Please keep your eyes on Akagi and don't look behind you~
Hello, bootl... *Ahem*, Akagi. I suppose you're shopping with the Commander.
Yes. Would you care to join us?
I'm... Sorry, I'll pass. It's your day off with the Commander and I wouldn't want to be a third wheel.
Now, now, don't worry about that. I'm fine sharing the Commander with you. You certainly don't mind either, right, Commander?
Akagi forcefully drew Kaga by her hand over to my side.
Akagi... I would much rather not...
... And so, Akagi, Kaga, and I enjoyed our day of peaceful (in some sense, anyway) shopping.
